name: The Synthwave Arcade - Team Kaliente
description: Something that sometimes goes unrecognised in the games industry is where the ideas for games originate. Not all games come from the same place - and this is something to be celebrated. Different genres, cultures, and ideas are great ways to spread diversity within the games industry, and with this project we aim to bring attention to that in our retro Synthwave Arcade. Play through a side scrolling platformer, top-down shooter, and thrilling racing game as you explore the origins of many different games throughout history!
